description: This file is a PHP source file that generates a web page for viewing network connection details and modem status on a router or gateway device. It includes server-side logic to fetch network parameters, modem information, and status indicators, and renders an HTML page with various network-related data, tables, and user interface elements.

methods.name: div_mod
methods.description: Divides two numbers and returns quotient and remainder as an array, with safety checks for non-numeric or zero divisor.

methods.name: sec2dhms
methods.description: Converts seconds into a string formatted as days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
